body_html:
I got the same error when using wide and deep model:

m = tf.contrib.learn.DNNLinearCombinedClassifier(
    model_dir=FLAGS.model_dir,
    linear_feature_columns=wide,
    dnn_feature_columns=deep,
    dnn_hidden_units=[100, 50],
    config=run_config
)
validation_metrics = {
    "streaming_auc": tf.contrib.metrics.streaming_auc,
    "precision": tf.contrib.metrics.streaming_precision
}

validation_monitor = tf.contrib.learn.monitors.ValidationMonitor(
    input_fn=lambda: input_fn(test_file_list),
    every_n_steps=FLAGS.validation_steps,
    metrics=validation_metrics
)

m.fit(input_fn=lambda: input_fn(train_file_list),
      max_steps=FLAGS.train_steps,
      monitors=[validation_monitor])
body_text:
I got the same error when using wide and deep model:
m = tf.contrib.learn.DNNLinearCombinedClassifier(
    model_dir=FLAGS.model_dir,
    linear_feature_columns=wide,
    dnn_feature_columns=deep,
    dnn_hidden_units=[100, 50],
    config=run_config
)
validation_metrics = {
    "streaming_auc": tf.contrib.metrics.streaming_auc,
    "precision": tf.contrib.metrics.streaming_precision
}

validation_monitor = tf.contrib.learn.monitors.ValidationMonitor(
    input_fn=lambda: input_fn(test_file_list),
    every_n_steps=FLAGS.validation_steps,
    metrics=validation_metrics
)

m.fit(input_fn=lambda: input_fn(train_file_list),
      max_steps=FLAGS.train_steps,
      monitors=[validation_monitor])
body:
I got the same error when using wide and deep model:

```
m = tf.contrib.learn.DNNLinearCombinedClassifier(
    model_dir=FLAGS.model_dir,
    linear_feature_columns=wide,
    dnn_feature_columns=deep,
    dnn_hidden_units=[100, 50],
    config=run_config
)
validation_metrics = {
    "streaming_auc": tf.contrib.metrics.streaming_auc,
    "precision": tf.contrib.metrics.streaming_precision
}

validation_monitor = tf.contrib.learn.monitors.ValidationMonitor(
    input_fn=lambda: input_fn(test_file_list),
    every_n_steps=FLAGS.validation_steps,
    metrics=validation_metrics
)

m.fit(input_fn=lambda: input_fn(train_file_list),
      max_steps=FLAGS.train_steps,
      monitors=[validation_monitor])
```
